Welcome to python-template's documentation!
===========================================




.. |github logo| image:: GitHub-Mark.png
  :width: 16

|github logo| Github repository: https://github.com/plfelter/python-template


This documentation aims at describing the tools and workflow that can be used to work on a Python project.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Sections:

   tools
   project-setup
   dev-work-flow


.. note::

   This project is under active development.


Check out the :doc:`tools` section for further information.
